column3: 2015 u. s air force veteran. campbell jr.
column7: age 53. loving father of tyler (holly hesketh) & mikaela campbell. dear son of charlene (nee pickelheimer) meyer & the late samuel archie campbell
column8: sr. brother of christopher campbell. grandfather of gracie jo. uncle of emily campbell & nathan campbell. nephew of jackie alice (elbert) wilson. memorials to wounded warrior project. warrior projectpo box 758517. topeka
